attributes.action: Stop politicians expenses all together and just have a normal wage like the rest of us!
attributes.additional_details:
To strip away all MP expenses and have a normal wage of £66,000. When the normal working class can't afford to go on holidays or pay off their payday loans then politicians can't keep doing this in a democratic society, if they need extra money then i'm sure wonga will help them out with their 1478% interest rates.
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-1214148/MPs-owe-Parliament-140-000-unpaid-food-wine-bills.html
http://www.theguardian.com/politics/2012/may/11/mps-expenses-scandal-what-next
Help bring down this menace to the public purse.
